interestingFact: Alaska is the largest state and is bigger than Texas, California, and Montana combined.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
Australia is home to the world's largest coral reef, the Great Barrier Reef.
India has the wettest inhabited place on Earth, Mawsynram.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the world's largest tropical forest.
Japan has the world's oldest company, which has been operating since 578 AD.
The French Army was the first to use camouflage in World War I.
Germany is known for its high-speed Autobahn, with no speed limit in some areas.
